title: Reincarnating Into a Different World… Ain’t This! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Depictions of Cruelty   Gods   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Onmyouji   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Sudden Strength Gain
author: Tansan   タンサン
description:
The protagonist now starting his high school life, Yuuki Kousuke, loses his life upon saving another person. However, that life of his isn’t over yet.

By luck, the old man he helped is a God, and he reincarnates him in another world out of gratitude. The same way it happens in his beloved novels about other worlds, our protagonist gratefully accepts being reincarnate in another world with a cheat ability. Except, the place he wakes up in… is a morgue.

With a cheat ability that hasn’t physically changed him in the slightest, this is the story of our protagonist’s modern day revival as he lives a tranquil life.

…Yet while saying this, he is getting dragged into various incidents and numerous more fights.>
